name: Apple iPad mini 2 16GB WiFi
shortDescription: With this Apple iPad mini 2 16GB, you have easy access to the high-tech world right in the palm of your hand. This small but powerful device boasts a beautiful retina display that gives you vivid images and high screen quality. This Apple iPad mini 2 WiFi comes with an A7 chip with motion coprocessor. It also has built-in Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) with MIMO support so accessing the internet is simple and easy. It features a FaceTime HD camera so you can reach out to friends and family with video calls whenever you want. This 7.9" tablet is the ideal size for easy storage but with a screen big enough for you to view pictures and videos with ease. It comes with 5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording so you can take pictures and create videos that you will be proud to share. This Apple iPad mini 2 16GB comes complete with iPhoto, iMovie, Garageband, Pages, Numbers and Keynote apps for your convenience.

name: PlayStation 4 UNCHARTED: The Nathan Drake Collection Console Disc Bundle (PS4)
Apple iPod touch 16GB, Assorted Colors
shortDescription: <p>Whether you're an avid gamer looking for a more powerful way to play, a music devotee seeking a better portable music experience, or a hobbyist photographer with an adventurous streak, the Apple 16 GB iPod touch packs a host of awesome features into a sleek package. A stunningly crisp 4-inch Retina display, a powerful A8 chip and M8 motion coprocessor make for a beautifully detailed, highly responsive gaming experience. Connect to Wi-Fi to FaceTime with friends and family, download music and games, send messages to your friends or post to social media. Capture the fun of impromptu gatherings with the iPod's 8-megapixel iSight camera with exposure control and improved HDR and face detection. And of course, the iPod touch is a sleek way to keep your music with you, and access the iTunes Store to grab your next favorite album. Attractive and designed to go with you everywhere, the iPod touch is available in 5 stunning colors to suit anyone's taste.</p>

name: Xbox One Console Value Bundle with Bonus Controller (Save $85)
shortDescription: <b>Xbox One Console Solution Bundle:</b><ul><li>Choice of Xbox One Console Bundle</li><li>Bonus Controller</li></ul><p>* Items in main image may become unavailable. Only items selected will be received. Click on items for more information.</p>

name: RCA Viking Pro 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet 32GB Quad Core
shortDescription: <p>Versatile and powerful, the RCA Viking Pro 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet with detachable keyboard offers an adjustable and multi-faceted user experience to suit a wide range of uses. The 10 Viking Pro operates on Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and showcases the operating system's brand-new, critically-acclaimed visual design. The Viking Pro's amazingly clear, 10.1-inch high definition screen makes for an incredibly vivid and detailed viewing experience, and the impressive 1.3GHz quad-core processor is powerful enough to zip through applications and tasks quickly. Use the detachable keyboard and built-in trackpad to update your social statuses, compose emails and navigate the Web. When it's time to get down to business, open up the included WPS Office app to create compelling documents and spreadsheets. Effortlessly transition the RCA 10 Viking Pro into a stand-alone tablet by detaching the keyboard. Available in Pink, Sky Blue, Purple or Charcoal for a stylish, personal 2-in-1 tablet experience.</p>

name: Xbox One 500GB Console  - Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Bundle
shortDescription: Pre-order the Xbox One 500GB Gears of War Ultimate Edition Console Bundle, featuring a full-game download of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, the Superstar Cole multiplayer Xbox One Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Bundlelayer skin, and early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta. Experience the advancement of the latest. The Xbox One Gears of War bundle outdoes the original Gears of War and is rebuilt from the ground up in 1080p, including 60FPS competitive multiplayer with 19 maps, six game modes and five campaign chapters never released on the console. This edition is also your ticket to the 4 Beta. The Xbox one 500GB console bundle features the first game at its best, a bundle for veterans of the series and newcomers alike. Bring all the excitement and adventure to your screen as you play against other gamers. The Xbox One 500GB Gears of War Ultimate Edition Console Bundle is a nice addition to a serious player who wants to take their fun to the next level.

name: Xbox One White 500GB Gears of War Special Edition Console Bundle - Walmart Exclusive
shortDescription: Be a part of a special gaming experience and take advantage of this Walmart Exclusive by purchasing this Xbox One Gears of War Console Bundle. It includes a variety of features, such as the Cirrus White console and controller, a full-game download of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, the Superstar Cole multiplayer skin and early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta. The 500GB White Xbox One Special Edition Console lets you experience the original Gears of War rebuilt from the ground up in 1080p, including 60FPS competitive multiplayer with 19 maps and six game modes. You also get five campaign chapters that have never been released on console. For a limited time, when you play Gears of War: Ultimate Edition on this gaming console, you will get the entire Xbox 360 Gears of War collection to play on Xbox One. Gears of War: Ultimate Edition is also your ticket to the Gears of War 4 Beta. This is the first Gears at its best and is a bundle for veterans of the series and newcomers alike.

name: SCEPTRE X405BV-F 40" LED Class 1080P HDTV with ultra slim metal brush bezel, 60Hz
shortDescription: <p>The Sceptre 40" LED Class Full 1080P HDTV X405BV-F with 60Hz delivers top of the line picture and audio quality at an amazing value. This LED HDTV features a sleek and streamlined look that will lend an air of elegance to any room, with its sophisticated glossy black finish and slim brushed metal bezels. The 1080P LED display is composed with over 2 million pixels, delivering a vast array of vivid colors and rich, clear details, and the amazing automatic contrast enhancement helps balance images to look bolder and more lifelike. A 60Hz refresh rate lets you watch your favorite shows and movies flicker-free for an uninterrupted viewing experience. The Sceptre 40" LED Class also comes equipped with 3 HDMI ports that let you connect game systems and other devices with the convenience of a single cord. Experience home theatre surround sound without moving from your couch by controlling the Scepter sound bar with a click of the included remote control.</p>

name: SCEPTRE X322BV-M 32" LED Class 720P HDTV with ultra slim metal brush bezel, 60Hz
shortDescription: Get a complete entertainment experience with the SCEPTRE X322BV-MQC 32" LED Class 720P HDTV. Plug in your Blu Ray or DVD player or your preferred video game console with the three available HDMI inputs. This 60Hz 32" LED HDTV with ultra-slim metal brush bezel features a features crystal clear display. It emits brighter and more robust colors and has a fast response time for non-ghosting images. The additional feature of a USB port helps further expand the functionality of your television. It allows users to listen to music and view digital pictures quickly and conveniently on this 32" HDTV. It can also be used as a PC monitor for a better viewing experience. This item comes with a built-in digital tuner for catching your favorite broadcast shows. It also has a true 16:9 aspect ratio for watching your movies the way that the director intended.

name: RCA 7" Tablet 16GB Quad Core
shortDescription: <p>Introducing the RCA 7 Voyager II 7-inch Google Certified Tablet. Operating on Android's sweetest operating system yet, Android 5.0 (Lollipop), you can enjoy more of what the Google Play store has to offer, whether you're into gaming, social apps, music, movies or are looking for the latest productivity app. Share a smile with friends and family using the tablet's front camera. Use the tablet's built-in Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with compatible devices. Whether taking in a movie, playing a favorite game or surfing the Web, the RCA tablet's quad-core processor and 16GB flash-storage provide an excellent portable experience.</p>

name: Xbox One 500GB Console with Kinect Bundle
Samsung UN55JU6700 55" Curved 4K Ultra HD 2160p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV (4K x 2K) - Qualifies for Premium Delivery
shortDescription: The Samsung UN55JU6700 55" Curved 4K Ultra HD TV (4K x 2K), 2160p 60Hz Smart HDTV allows you to become deeply drawn into the action with an immersive curved screen and it qualifies for premium delivery. This TV provides a Smart TV experience that puts your favorite content at your fingertips. The 55" LED TV will allow you to enjoy a picture with four times the crispness of full HD with a 4K Ultra HD resolution. It has a clear picture whether you are watching your favorite sports team or your favorite movies.The Samsung LED TV has a 55" panel with a 3840 x 2160 Ultra HD resolution to give an ideal picture quality to any video that you will watch on this device.

name: Samsung UN40J5200 40-inch LED HDTV
shortDescription: The Samsung J5200 Series 40" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV improves your entertainment time. It makes all your favorite shows, movies, games and media content come to life. The 1080p smart HDTV provides twice the resolution of standard HDTV. Enjoy an intuitive, connected home entertainment experience with this device. Get a clear moving picture resolution at motion rate 60 with amazing refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology. The 16:9 aspect ratio allows you to see every image as the director intended with enriched colors, even with older, non-HD content. With this 40" smart TV, you can access your favorite program choices, live TV, video on demand, apps and social media. It comes in one easy-to-browse navigation experience. The built-in Wi-Fi will enhance your family's TV viewing experience by effortlessly connecting with more content.

name: RCA Cambio 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet 32GB Intel Quad Core Windows 10
shortDescription: Introducing the RCA Cambio 10.1-inch high-resolution Windows tablet with detachable keyboard. Powered by an Intel processor, the RCA Cambio is ready to tackle any task. Preloaded with Windows 10, the RCA Cambio boasts a clean and easy-to-use user interface. Create powerful documents and slideshows with Microsoft Office mobile apps including Word mobile, PowerPoint mobile and Excel Mobile. Store your files on the ample built-in 32GB flash memory or use the microSD card slot which supports up to 64GB of additional storage. Use the Cambio's Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with nearby compatible devices. Connect with the world and setup a videoconference using the Cambio's front 1MP or rear 2MP cameras.

name: Samsung UN32J4500AFXZA 32" 720p 60Hz Class LED Smart HDTV
shortDescription: Enjoy crystal clear television, movies and more with the Samsung 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV, UN32J4500AFXZA. It features a built-in digital tuner to capture local broadcasts. This LED smart HDTV has two HDMI input ports to enhance the high-def experience. With up to a 1366 x 768 resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio you can see images edge-to-edge and you won't miss a thing. This Samsung 32" 720p LED HDTV lets you easily navigate to find your favorite show, movies, sports and games using the Smart Hub feature. It has built-in WiFi so you can stream videos and other content directly from the internet. The Samsung 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV, UN32J4500AFXZA, includes a base or can be wall-mounted if you prefer.

name: ProScan PLDED3280A 32" 720p 60Hz D-LED HDTV
shortDescription: Watch your favorite shows and movies in quality with this ProScan HDTV PLDED3280A. The 32" D-LED panel with 1366 x 768 HD resolution offers enhanced graphics. It allows you to watch movies just as the director intended. This TV has true 16:9 aspect ratio along with wide 178-degree vertical and 178-degree horizontal angles so you can see a clear picture from anywhere in the room. The built-in digital tuner lets you watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available. It has two HDMI inputs so you can enjoy a superior HD experience. This 720p HDTV is wall mountable for easy placement and it meets VESA standards. A USB port is in place for added functionality. The screen measures 31.5" diagonally from corner to corner. It works with a wide range of TV stands.

name: RCA LED32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz Class LED HDTV
shortDescription: The RCA LED32G30RQ 32" Class LED HDTV is a brilliant addition to your entertainment center. It supports 1366 x 768 resolution and features true 16:9 aspect ratio, allowing you to watch your favorite movies and shows just like the director intended. This 60Hz 720p LED TV also has wide 176-degree vertical and 176-degree horizontal angles, so you can see a clear picture from anywhere in the room. This is especially useful when watching those big games with family and friends. A built-in digital tuner lets you watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available. The RCA 32" LED HDTV is equipped with two HDMI ports for connecting your HD-enabled devices.<p><b>Note</b>: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the RCA 32" LED HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.</p>

name: Samsung UN60J6200 60" 1080p 60Hz Class LED HDTV
shortDescription: Take your entertainment experience to a new level with this Samsung UN60J6200 60" 1080p 60Hz Class LED HDTV. With it, you can navigate effortlessly through the Smart technology to find your favorite shows, movies, sports and games. Go beyond watching TV and check out the latest YouTube hits and entertainment news. You can also do some online shopping with full web browsing capabilities. See it all with enhanced picture quality, including a wider spectrum of colors. The Samsung 1080p LED HDTV has a true 16:9 aspect ratio so you can view your movies as the director intended and see a clear picture from anywhere in the room. It also has a built-in digital tuner. This TV is equipped with two HDMI inputs and built-in Wi-Fi so you can stream content directly from the Internet. It boasts DTS StudioSound for your listening pleasure.

name: Sceptre X505BV-F 50" 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
shortDescription: <p>The stylish, glossy black Sceptre X505BV-F 50" LED 1080P HDTV with 60Hz offers a truly customizable viewing experience. This LED HDTV features a sleek and streamlined look that will lend an air of elegance to any room, with a sophisticated glossy black finish and swiveling screen. The 1080P LED display is composed of over 2 million pixels, delivering a vast array of vivid colors and rich, clear details, and the amazing automatic contrast enhancement helps balance images to look bolder and more lifelike. A 60Hz refresh rate lets you watch your favorite shows and movies flicker-free for an uninterrupted viewing experience. The Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) transfers all of your thrilling multimedia entertainment (including movies, TV and music) from your MHL-enabled smart phone or tablet onto your TV screen. The Sceptre 50" HDTV also comes equipped with 3 HDMI ports that let you connect game systems and other devices with the convenience of a single cord.</p>

name: Sceptre E555BV-F 55" 1080p 60Hz Class LED HDTV
shortDescription: Sceptre is pleased to introduce the E555BV-F 55-inch LED HDTV. Packed with 1080p resolution, an almost endless variety of vibrant colors and sharply bold images practically leap from the 55-inch display. With three HDMI ports, enjoy connecting three of your favorite devices to this LED HDTV at once. The second HDMI port is equipped with Mobile HD Link technology, which can connect any MHL-enabled smartphone or tablet to the TV. All the actions performed on the MHL-enabled device will be mirrored on the screen. Now, not only can you watch, but you can also interact by exploring all of your apps on a 55-inch screen! Roku Ready is also built into this MHL port, so yet another avenue of exhilarating entertainment is at your fingertips.<br><br><b>Note:</b> You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre 55" LED HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.

name: Apple iPad Air 32GB WiFi
shortDescription: For work, school or personal use, the Apple iPad Air 32GB WiFi is a wise choice. It features the A7 chip with M7 motion co-processor and 64-bit architecture, which lets you multitask and enjoy even the most demanding applications. The iOS 8 environment ensures smooth, user-friendly interface and navigation, while WiFi 802.11a/b/g/n provides ultrafast wireless access to the Internet. This iPad Air with retina display includes features such as 5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording, a FaceTime HD camera as well as iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, iCloud and more. You also get access to over 475,000 apps on the App Store (refers to the total number worldwide, not all content is available in all countries). The Apple iPad Air Tablet is 20 percent thinner when compared with iPad (4th generation) and weighs just one pound, so it feels unbelievably light in your hand.

name: Beats Studio Over-Ear Headphones - Assorted Colors
shortDescription: The Beats Studio Over-Ear Headphones, Assorted Colors, offer the sound quality you are looking for. The popular headset has been completely redesigned and re-imagined. The new Beats studio headphones are even lighter, stronger and more comfortable. They sound better than ever with precision sound, adaptive noise canceling and remote talk. The rechargeable headphones feature a 20-hour rechargeable battery, so you can listen virtually uninterrupted all day. They come is your choice of eight colors, allowing you to put some of your personality into them. They include a charging cable, a power adapter, an audio cable, a remote talk cord, a hard shell carrying case and a Beats cleaning cloth. They have all the energy and excitement you expect from Beats, plus a powerful re-engineered sound.

An eco sensor feature intelligently adapts the screen's brightness to help efficiently manage energy use.</p>
